com.viaoa.object

Class OAObjectEmptyHubDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OAObjectEmptyHubDelegate

  • public class OAObjectEmptyHubDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    This is used to store a reference to all empty hubs, so that a restart can create as an empty Hub, and not go to DS. see: OAObjectReflectDelegate.getReferenceHub(), which will create an empty hub without accessing the db.
    Author:
    vvia

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OAObjectEmptyHubDelegate() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void initialize(OAObject obj)
      Called by OAObject.afterLoad() to initialize any Hubs that are empty, so that they will not need to go to the database.
      static void load(java.io.File file)
      Load the file that contains info for all empty hubs.
      static void save(java.io.File file)
      This can be called at program close, to create a list of all objects with empty hubs - to be used by load.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(OAObject obj)
        Called by OAObject.afterLoad() to initialize any Hubs that are empty, so that they will not need to go to the database.
        Parameters:
        oaObj -

      • load

        public static void load(java.io.File file)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the file that contains info for all empty hubs. Note: the file should then be deleted, and not reused.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • save

        public static void save(java.io.File file)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This can be called at program close, to create a list of all objects with empty hubs - to be used by load.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
